definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need

sentences.english: That’s how negative people could drain your positive energy.
sentences.chinese: 这就是消极的人如何打消掉你的积极性了。

sentences.english: What I perceive as a negative thought may be something natural for somebody else.
sentences.chinese: 我所理解的消极思想可能对其他人来说是自然的。

sentences.english: Scientists have a negative attitude to the theory.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们对这个理论的态度是相当消极的。

sentences.english: Churches are now too often destructive battlegrounds of an ideological right and left.
sentences.chinese: 而今教堂往往成为意识形态左右派相斗的消极战场。

sentences.english: Have certain effect to counteractive exhaustion and negative sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 对反抗疲惫与消极情绪有一定的作用。

sentences.english: It will diminish the negative self-talk you may sometimes experience.
sentences.chinese: 它会抵制你偶尔出现的消极的自我暗示。

sentences.english: But modern life has its downsides too.
sentences.chinese: 但现代生活也有其消极的一面。

sentences.english: Civil disobedience isn't moral because it's non-violent.
sentences.chinese: 消极抵抗并非因为其非暴力的特点而称得上道德。

sentences.english: The negative person must grow in positiveness before God will say"Go".
sentences.chinese: 消极的人必须学会积极，上帝才能使用他。

sentences.english: Passive Customers Complain to all their friends about you.
sentences.chinese: 消极型的投诉者客户把对你的抱怨告诉所有的朋友。

sentences.english: Thus neuroses are the negative of perversions.
sentences.chinese: 如此神经症就是性倒错的消极形式。

sentences.english: Of course, there are also negative aspects of self-employment.
sentences.chinese: 当然，自主创业也有很多消极方面。

sentences.english: Re-frame an event to see the positive along with the negative.
sentences.chinese: 重新对待一件活动，除了消极面还看到积极面。

sentences.english: Teasing can be overwhelmingly negative yet delivered with positive emotion.
sentences.chinese: 取笑可以在极消极的情况下仍传递积极情绪。

sentences.english: We all know people who are negative.
sentences.chinese: 我们都认识一些消极的人。

sentences.english: Do you think school violence has a really negative inpact on teenagers?
sentences.chinese: 你是否认为校园暴力对青少年有非常消极的影响？

definition: (idiom) to blame the gods and accuse others
to abandon oneself to despair/to give up and stop bothering
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through/without high ambitions, but getting by
